wss.js

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00046 W.style = function(obj, wss){
00047   // if the argument is a string, treat as a HTML-tag and create an object
00048   if(typeof obj == 'string')
00049     obj = document.createElement(obj);
00050   var s = obj.style;
00051   var tmp, latestProp;
00052   if(!wss) return obj;
00053   wss = wss.split(';');
00054   for(var i = 0; i < wss.length; ++i){
00055     tmp = wss[i].split(':');
00056     if(typeof tmp[1] == 'undefined'){
00057       s[tmp[0]] = latestProp;
00058     }else s[tmp[0]] = latestProp = tmp[1];
00059   }
00060   return obj;
00061 };
